My Work

Shopping Cart

This is a full stack MERN shopping cart application for video games. The application features a beautiful user interface utilizing Material-UI components. This application allows you to add and remove games from the cart. In addtion, the games may be filtered by game console and sorted by price . The cart shows you how many items are in the cart, the quantity and price of each item, and the total prices of all items in the cart.

  • React
  • MongoDB
  • Express
  • Node.js
  • Material-UI

Beautiful User Interface


  • Very attractive user interface utilizing Material-UI components.

Add and remove items from Cart


  • Easily add items to cart by clicking the red plus icon in the lower right corner of the item card.
  • Easily remove items from cart by clicking the trashcan icon next to item in cart.

Filter products!


  • Easily sort the games by price utilizing the price drop down list.
  • Easily filter the games by game console and utilizing the console drop down list.

Cart Subtotal


  • The cart shows each item added to the cart, its price, quantity, and the total price of all items in the cart.

Full Stack MERN Application


  • Utilizes React on the front end
  • Utilizes express and node.js to connect to the mongoDb database on the backend
